fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Drop a banana peel on someone's house, they will be roleblocked if they attempt to non-astrally visit a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn if anything the host deems funny/silly happens when rolling roles at the start of the game, you also learn if anything funny/silly happened this night at the end of each night.
- If you roleblock someone twice, they will fall so hard they die, you get jailed the next night if this happens.
